name: LPMD_S_XML_UTIL_EXIT_DELAY_500MS
summary: Verify change default xml configuration lpm exit delay from 0 to 500ms by setting 500 in <ExitDelayMS>0</ExitDelayMS>, to perform low power mode force enter, force exit, auto enter lpm, survivability mode enter, survivability mode exit and terminate, then verify if resample after  500 ms pattern is detected, verify if all the activity patterns are correct from debug logs
